The Hustle

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt1298644

Classificação: 5.5

Sinopse: In this remake of 1988's "Dirty Rotten Scoundrels," 2 con-women hustle in a small French Riviera town - one for small amounts from average men, and one for higher amounts wealthier men. They bet on what looks like an easy target. Winner gets $500K from him, and the loser leaves town forever.—Asher Zeiger
